articles.title: Ajaz Patel: ‘My Perfect 10 came after a lot of dramatic changes in my life and hard work’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: New Zealand’s left-arm spinner Ajaz Patel has become only the third bowler in Test cricket to take all 10 wickets in an innings. Yet it was quite a journey finding his groove.
articles.content: The ace cricketer talks about transitioning, first as a child moving to New Zealand and then rising up the ranks in the game while battling racism. Still true to his origins, he feels politics is a d… [+16964 chars]
